question: Which city's regional passport kendra won the the award for the best passport office in India for the year 2016-17?
explanation: Regional Passport Office, Cochin, has won the award for the best passport office in India for the year 2016-17, amongst the big passport offices in the country that falls in category A. It had a score of 9.85 out of 10, which is highest among all passport offices in India, irrespective of the category.
